HARITASEAT.NS.summary: Harita Seating Systems Limited provides seating solutions for automotive industry in India. It offers driver and cabin seating solutions for commercial vehicles, tractors, off-road vehicles, original equipment manufacturers, and construction equipment; and passenger seats for buses. The company also manufactures and sells seat foams. It also exports its products. Harita Seating Systems Limited was founded in 1988 and is based in Chennai, India.
